title: Circular economies with Belinda Chellingworth (418)
description: Dr Karl consults with circular economy expert, experienced waste manager, change maker and garbologist Belinda Chellingworth. Waste is expensive so well-designed product cycles makes it better for us all. drkarl.com   BC Consulting
